content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Stone Furnace at position(1, 1)
Consists of the following entities
- Stone Furnace (position (1.0, 1.0)) with a status of EntityStatus.WORKING, currently smelting copper ore into copper plates.

### Electricity Group
Consists of the following entities
- Small electric poles at positions (1.5, 3.5), (2.5, 1.5), (6.5, 4.5), and (2.5, 2.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough copper-plate in your inventory before attempting to craft copper cables. The recipe requires 1 copper-plate for each copper cable.

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the furnace. If you receive an error stating "No copper-ore to insert from your inventory," check your inventory for the required items.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
